columns.Description: Date and time when the record was generated
columns.Name: Timestamp

columns.Description: Unique identifier for the event
columns.Name: ReportId

columns.Description: Unique identifier for the account in Microsoft Entra ID
columns.Name: AccountObjectId

columns.Description: User principal name (UPN) of the account
columns.Name: AccountUpn

columns.Description: On-premises security identifier (SID) of the account
columns.Name: OnPremSid

columns.Description: Name displayed in the address book entry for the account user. This is usually a combination of the given name, middle initial, and surname of the user.
columns.Name: AccountDisplayName

columns.Description: User name of the account
columns.Name: AccountName

columns.Description: Domain of the account
columns.Name: AccountDomain

columns.Description: The criticality score of each account
columns.Name: CriticalityLevel

columns.Description: The certificate’s type. It is one of the following: Machine, Server, Intermediate, Root, TrustedPublisher or Other
columns.Name: Type

columns.Description: On premises distinguished name of the account user
columns.Name: DistinguishedName

columns.Description: Cloud security identifier of the account
columns.Name: CloudSid

columns.Description: Given name or first name of the account user
columns.Name: GivenName

columns.Description: Surname, family name, or last name of the account user
columns.Name: Surname

columns.Description: Name of the department that the account user belongs to
columns.Name: Department

columns.Description: Job title of the account user
columns.Name: JobTitle

columns.Description: SMTP address of the account
columns.Name: EmailAddress

columns.Description: Voice of over IP (VOIP) session initiation protocol (SIP) address of the account
columns.Name: SipProxyAddress

columns.Description: Address of the account user
columns.Name: Address

columns.Description: City where the client IP address is geolocated
columns.Name: City

columns.Description: Country/Region where the account user is located
columns.Name: Country

columns.Description: Indicates whether the account is enabled or not
columns.Name: IsAccountEnabled

columns.Description: Manager of the account user
columns.Name: Manager

columns.Description: Phone number of the account user
columns.Name: Phone

columns.Description: Date and time when the account user was created
columns.Name: CreatedDateTime

columns.Description: The primary Identity provider of the account user
columns.Name: SourceProvider

columns.Description: The last source system to modify the account user
columns.Name: ChangeSource

columns.Description: A calculation based on the position of the user in the org tree and the user's Microsoft Entra roles and permissions. Possible values: Low, Medium, High
columns.Name: BlastRadius

columns.Description: The name for the company in which the user works
columns.Name: CompanyName

columns.Description: The date and time the user was deleted
columns.Name: DeletedDateTime

columns.Description: The employee identifier assigned to the user by the organization
columns.Name: EmployeeId

columns.Description: Additional email addresses of the user
columns.Name: OtherMailAddresses

columns.Description: The AAD risk level (Low/Medium/High) of the user account
columns.Name: RiskLevel

columns.Description: Details regarding the AAD risk level
columns.Name: RiskLevelDetails

columns.Description: State where the sign-in occurred, if available
columns.Name: State

columns.Description: Labels representing various attributes used to identify or categorize a security configuration
columns.Name: Tags

columns.Description: Active roles assigned to the account
columns.Name: AssignedRoles

columns.Description: A snapshot of privileged role assignment schedules and eligibility schedules for the account as maintained by Microsoft Entra Privileged Identity Management (excluding activated assignments)
columns.Name: PrivilegedEntraPimRoles
